title: 报错崩溃 好像是多世界出问题了
txt_content:
把多世界的keepspawnmemory改true后 玩家进来就报错崩溃
Description: Exception ticking world

java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space
        at net.minecraft.nbt.NBTTagCompound.<init>(NBTTagCompound.java:20)

        at net.minecraft.world.gen.ChunkProviderServer.func_73242_b(ChunkProviderServer.java:358)
        at net.minecraft.world.gen.ChunkProviderServer.func_73156_b(ChunkProviderServer.java:503)
        at net.minecraft.world.WorldServer.func_72835_b(WorldServer.java:261)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71190_q(MinecraftServer.java:931)

replies.txt_content:
知道了，，，
不用回答了 -  -
/mvm set adjustsapwn true
